FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near 26th/Lawndale
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted Southbound: Central Park, 31st and Lawndale; Northbound: Central Park and 25th: due to street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 26th/Lawndale, due to street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

Southbound buses will operate via Central Park, 31st, Lawndale and over regular route.

Northbound buses will operate via Central Park, 25th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line Line trains are running with wait times of up to 60 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line Line trains are running, but with extended wait times, from the area of 63rd/Cottage Grove. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 60 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
